page.title: 11WALLHAMPTON PREP SCHOOL
page.content: SCHOOLS <PRIVATE> Walhampton prep. Scchool was started in 1948 and became a Charitable Trust in 1954.Fees <paid by parents> day pupils Â£950 per term,boarders Â£1335 per term.182 pupils from 4_13 years. Staff ratio 1_10 plus ancillaries. The building is an impressive house in 90 acres of beautiful grounds.The oldest part is Queen Anna style <1711> with an added Victroian wing <1890> The ground floor has a Hall,Chapel and Music room.First floor has form rooms and the top floor the dormitories. There are modern additions for science,art and a gymnasium.There is a swimming pool and many other sports facilities in the grounds. The Headmaster lives in the former Banana House and Orangery.
